how_are_you_responses: I'm doing well. How about you?
compliment_responses: Thank you! You're pretty awesome too.
name: What's your name?
Who are you?

name_responses: I'm Neuralite! Nice to meet you.
jokes_responses: Why did the scarecrow win an award? Because he was outstanding in his field!
I told my computer I needed a break. Now it won't stop sending me Kit-Kats.
Why did the math book look sad? Because it had too many problems.
